task.title: Customize to Render PDF Images (Experimental Support)

keywords.indexterm: XML documentsAuthor Mode editingImage renderingPDF images
PDF image rendering in Author mode

context.p: provides experimental support for PDF images using the Apache PDFBox library.
To enable the rendering of PDF images in Author mode, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: Go to and download the pre-built PDFBox standalone binary JAR files: pdfbox-1.8.x.jar, fontbox-1.8.x.jar, and jempbox-1.8.x.jar.

info.note: It is not recommended to use pdfbox-app-1.8.x.jar file instead of the three specified files because it contains additional classes that may cause conflicts elsewhere in .

step.cmd: Copy the downloaded JAR libraries to the \lib directory.
Open OXYGEN_PLUGIN_DIR/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF and add a reference to the JAR libraries in the Bundle-ClassPath entry.

cmd.ph: Restart Eclipse in clean mode (edit the shortcut you use to start Eclipse and add -clean as the first argument.)
